ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package corn bread muffin mix

cookingTips: Mix batter just until combined; overmixing develops gluten and makes cornbread tough
Fold in cream corn gently to distribute evenly without deflating mixture
Bake at correct temperature and time per box instructions to avoid dry or underbaked cornbread
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How can I make sure the cornbread stays moist with the cream corn addition without making it gummy?
